sentences.en: A sort of halo, an occidental glow, came over life then.
sentences.cn: 那时候,就有一种祥光, 一片晚霞, 在生活上,笼罩缭绕.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, Eton has been promoting the marriage of the Oriental and Occidental.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 裕景大饭店一贯坚持中西结合,对艺术有自己独到的见解和品味.

sentences.en: This paper is a part of the research on Sino - occidental religious thoughts.
sentences.cn: 摘要本文是中西宗教思想比较研究中的一部分.

trans.tran_cn: 西方的，西洋的，西方人（文化）的，[天]西天的
trans.tran_en: Occidental means relating to the countries of Europe and North and South America
someone from the western part of the world
